hero.headline: Hi, I'm Florian
hero.sub: A passionate full-stack <highlight>web developer</highlight> from Hanover
hero.dot_box: With a passion for <highlight>web development</highlight>, I create <u>dynamic</u> and <u>user-friendly</u> <highlight>websites</highlight> and <highlight>web applications</highlight> based on the <u>latest technologies</u>.

contact.headline: Contact
contact.line_1: If you have any questions or would like to work with me, please feel free to contact me by email.
contact.line_2: I look forward to hearing from you and will get back to you as soon as possible.

about_me.headline: About me
about_me.sub_text1: Hello and welcome to my portfolio. I'm Florian, a passionate <highlight>full-stack web developer</highlight> from the beautiful Lower Saxony capital of Hanover.
about_me.sub_text2: For me, web development is much more than just a job. It's my great <highlight>passion</highlight>, which I love to invest a lot of my free time in because it simply gives me so much joy. It's a wonderful feeling to be able to spend so much of your free time doing something that gives you so much in return.
about_me.sub_text3: Since completing my training as an <highlight>IT specialist for application development</highlight> in 2021, I have been able to gain a lot of valuable experience and continuously improve my skills.
about_me.sub_text4: In <highlight>back-end development</highlight>, I prefer to work with PHP and various frameworks such as Laravel. But here, too, I always stay on the ball and enjoy learning new things to constantly expand my skill set.
about_me.sub_text5: In <highlight>front-end development</highlight>, I am a big fan of React and Next.js. With TailwindCSS, I have found a great way to design my projects quickly and efficiently.

job_data.title: Web Developer
job_data.desc: As a web developer at 1A-Infosysteme GmbH, I was responsible for the frontend development of our portals (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ColdFusion) and for the implementation of individual customer websites. WordPress responsible. In the backend, I developed efficient import processes and REST API interfaces in PHP.

job_data.title: Training as an IT specialist for application development (FIAE)
job_data.desc: During my training as an IT specialist for application development, I acquired comprehensive knowledge of software and web development. In my final project, I developed a qualification process for geodata based on the OpenStreetMap API interface.

job_data.title: Training as an IT assistant (ITA)
job_data.desc: During my training as an ITA, I learned the fundamentals of IT systems, network technology and programming. In addition to technical expertise, there was a special focus on the development and administration of IT solutions and user support.
